response:
"wie kann man noch davon sprechen, dass wir unsere persönlichen informationen schützen sollten, wenn unternehmen und regierungen unsere daten wie es ihnen gefällt, sammeln und verwenden? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation:

"how can we still talk about protecting our personal information when companies and governments collect and use our data as they please? #dataprotection #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of data privacy and questions the effectiveness of current measures to protect personal information. by using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy), the post also reaches a wider audience interested in these topics. the use of the german language and the reference to companies and governments collecting data "like they please" convey a sense of frustration and concern about the state of data privacy.
